Script.description: Displays Google results in a Preview Pane so you don't have to leave the results page. Click a second time to load the selected page.
Script.name: Google Preview Pane

Script.description: Shows results from Twitter on Google search pages
Script.name: Twitter Search Results on Google

Script.description: Shows results from Delicious on Google search pages
Script.name: Delicious Search Results on Google

Script.description: checks all your scripts for updates on user script.org
Script.name: Script Updater

Script.description: checks all your scripts for updates on user script.org
Script.name: Script AutoUpdater

Script.description: Easy way to check for scripts updates. Automatic checking, import installed scripts.
Script.name: Userscripts Updater

Script.description: Protects your browser from infinite alert loops. Overrides the default alert/confirm/prompt dialogs with versions that allow further messages to be cancelled. You need never be Rick-Rolled again! This script is actually a combination of some other greasemonkey anti-alert-loop scripts.
Script.name: Alert Watcher

Script.description: Adds your status to the homepage
Script.name: Facebook | Add Status

Script.description: Displays results for google image search, video search, wikipedia search and dictionary.com search alongside normal google searches.
Script.name: google extra

Script.description: Allows you to search other sites using the Google search.
Script.name: Google Shortcuts

Script.description: This maximized the vertical real estate in GMail by colapsing the links on the left to an image box, and moving the search to left side
Script.name: GMail Compactor

Script.description: Goes directly to the real URL of an image
Script.name: Google Image DirectLink

Script.description: View Google Image Search links in CSS Popup on Mouseover
Script.name: Google Image Relinker with Mouseover

Script.description: Shows the search results in two columns
Script.name: Google Two Columns

Script.description: highlight popular sites in google results
Script.name: Google Results Highlighter

Script.description: Combines the multi-page results on Google.com into single-page view with endless scrolling.
Script.name: Google - Single Page Results

Script.description: Adds a dropdown box to filter google results by date
Script.name: Google Filter by Date

Script.description: Nice Look&Feel + Sites ThumbShots + Global Google Suggest (multi-lang) + Full AutoPage Results + Easy Access to Advance Filters + Relink Images & FullSize preview + Search in Other Searchers + Static Menus & ToolBars + Multi-Language Feature + Full User's Settings... and more. [Op & FF]
Script.name: Google Fx

Script.description: Brings back the old Google favicon
Script.name: Google's Old Favicon

Script.description: 改善 Google 的搜索结果界面，提高阅读效率
Script.name: GoogleKingKong

Script.description: Script that adds some search links in last.fm artist pages.
Script.name: Last.FM Download Lookup

Script.description: Adds a tag cloud to the artist page
Script.name: Last.fm artist page tag cloud

Script.description: Makes ALL your YouTube videos go to HQ automatically. Now with autoplay off and color options. Your favorite YouTube script is better than ever!
Script.name: YouTube HQ + 720p Ultimate [MAR 2009] [+autoplay off option]

Script.description: Provides links to/from Sourceforge projects/homepages
Script.name: SF Project/Homepage

Script.description: Removes the right sidebar and adverts
Script.name: SourceForge - Cleaner Layout

Script.description: This hack will eliminate the need of Javascript for seeing menus on SorceForge.net. (Handy if you have NoScript extension on)
Script.name: SourceForge Menus with No Javascript

Script.description: Script to add some search links to last.fm artist, album, similar-artists and recommended-artists pages.
Script.name: Last.fm Torrent Search Links

Script.description: Provides links to the full image on Google's image search
Script.name: FullImage

Script.description: A tooltip pops up when hovering over links.
Script.name: Hover Links

Script.description: Provides useful links to search engines based on the page that you're viewing or the search that you're performing.
Script.name: Try This Search On

Script.description: Hyperlink Visited Styling for ALL WebPages. This style improves page navigation and element focus, for pages without their own form of displaying the pages you have already visited
Script.name: Custom Hyperlink Visited Color (Global)

Script.description: Pops up a floating div when you hover over a link, containing the target page!
Script.name: Hover Preview

Script.description: Presents a list of the group of links including the one that took you to the current page. Allows you to go to a neighbouring link without having to go Back. THIS IS BETA PREVIEW OF THE FINAL SCRIPT. I recommend you grab the Userscripts Updater, so that you know when I release the 1.0 version.
Script.name: track_history

Script.description: Adds favicons next to Google search results.
Script.name: FaviconizeGoogle

Script.description: Show includes for scripts on userscripts.org
Script.name: Userscripts show includes

Script.description: Removes unwanted fonts and uses your own.
Script.name: Cleanup Fonts

Script.description: Adds a virtual keyboard to text fields, password fields and textareas allowing keyboardless input of text and special characters. Install the script and double-click on one of the form element types above to display the keyboard.
Script.name: Virtual Keyboard Interface

Script.description: checks rapidshare links
Script.name: Rapidshare Links Checker

Script.description: Enlarges actor pictures in IMDb cast lists when you hover over that table row. Compatible with Greasemonkey and GreaseKit.
Script.name: IMDb enlarge actor pictures on hover

Script.description: Lets you see YouTube images in full size when you hover your mouse over them.
Script.name: YouTube Large Images

Script.description: Adds advanced features to Google Image Search.
Script.name: Google Image Search Advanced

Script.description: Lets you see Facebook images in full size when you hover over them.
Script.name: Facebook Large Images

Script.description: Lets you make Wikipedia images larger when you hover over them.
Script.name: Wikipedia Large Images

Script.description: Lets you see the images on images.google.com in full size by hovering over them.
Script.name: Google Images Large Images

Script.description: Makes Flickr's thumbnail images bigger on hover over.
Script.name: Flickr Large Images

Script.description: Lets you see twitter users' pictures in full size by hovering over their thumbnails.
Script.name: Twitter Large Images

Script.description: Adds graphical backbars to tables on Wikipedia, for easier absorption of numerical data.
Script.name: Wikipedia Backbars

Script.description: Adds a hover event to internal article links on wikipedia pages which, opens the article inline in a dhtml frame.
Script.name: Wikipedia Inline Article Viewer

Script.description: Keep the sidebar of Wiki's always visible and keep the languages you know on top in the 'other languages'-box
Script.name: Wiki sidebar tweak

Script.description: Shows tag-search results from my Delicious account on Google search pages, with links to more extensive Delicious searches. Use 'User Script Commands' -> 'Set Delicious Username' to specify your username
Script.name: My Delicious Search Results on Google

Script.description: Adds a link above photos to see them in their albums, even if you're not friends with the photographer. Adds links to view all photos of a user together (regardless of who took them). Adds links to view whole galleries/albums on one page.
Script.name: Facebook View Photo in Album

Script.description: Turn the headlines and comments of social link-sites (reddit, delicious, digg...) into ambient histograms.
Script.name: Backbars on social link-sites

Script.description: Show images inline in delicious
Script.name: Show Delicious Images

Script.description: Adds an 'inline view...' link to del.icio.us pages which loads the url inside a html iframe in the bottom of every link.
Script.name: del.icio.us Inline View

Script.description: Some readability tweaks to the new Delicious
Script.name: Delicious 2.0 readability tweaks

Script.description: Pads the text a little, improves the search box, colours the tag cloud.
Script.name: Userscripts.org Userscript

Script.description: A script to add favicons next to links on Google search results
Script.name: Favicon with Google 3

Script.description: Refills the form on the page from the CGI params (handy if the site is too stupid to do it for you).
Script.name: Refill Form

Script.description: Calculates and stores statistics for all the webpages you visit. Displays a summary of which pages are the most bloated.
Script.name: Profile Bloated Sites

Script.description: Now GreaseKit compatible and graphically customizable! The first update in months was well worth the wait.
Script.name: UnFuck Facebook

Script.description: Add short annotations to links on the front page or comments. "Ambiguous link" to youtube becomes "Ambiguous link [yt]". Tested with both Firefox and Opera
Script.name: Metafilter Annotate Links

Script.description: Dim out any links on Delicious that you've already saved in your own account.
Script.name: Delicious.com - Dim Saved Links

Script.description: A popup YouTube player appears when you click a YouTube video link
Script.name: YouTube Anywhere

Script.description: Add History box at wikimedia's leftmost column
Script.name: Wikimedia+ for Chrome (localStorage)

Script.description: Adds links to YouTube movie trailers for torrentz.com movie listings
Script.name: Torrentz YouTube Trailers

Script.description: IMDB Rating add for Torrentz.com
Script.name: Show IMDB Ratings on Torrentz.com

Script.description: Checks "do not share" by default on new delicious
Script.name: Private delicious

Script.description: Show Prev, Next, etc pagination links at top of list as well as bottom.
Script.name: Delicious.com - Top Pagination

Script.description: Rate your most favourite bookmarks on delicious.com with stars. Rated bookmarks will be highlighted within the bookmarks list for easy recognition.
Script.name: delicious star rater

Script.description: When it sees a link to a userscript or general Javascript URL, adds a Bookmarklet besides it, which you can drag to your toolbar to load the script when you next need it (running outside Greasemonkey of course).
Script.name: Make Bookmarklets from Javascript URLs

Script.description: Four visual improvements for Wikipedia (and other wikis): Indents sub-sections to make the layout clearer. Hides the sidebar (toggle by clicking the header). Floats the Table of Contents for access when scrolled. Converts heading underlines to overlines.
Script.name: WikiIndent

Script.description: Strips click tracking from Google search results
Script.name: Google Tracking-B-Gone

Script.description: Adds a favicon for the website next to every external link on the page. Clearly shows when you will be leaving the current site, and where you will be going!
Script.name: FaviconizeTheWeb

Script.description: Library for sending messaging to other tabs (requires postMessage API)
Script.name: GM_broadcast

Script.description: Shows a graph displaying delay vs time, giving an idea of how much CPU is being taken, by your browser or your system in general
Script.name: CPU Usage Graph

Script.description: Opens all links in IFrame, so going "back" is fast!
Script.name: OnePageWonder

Script.description: Puts the video title in the location bar of all YouTube video pages. Now with extra features addScrollbars, animateThumbnails and reduceFontSizes!
Script.name: Title Youtube Locations

Script.description: Intended for lists of users who have bookmarked a URL. May work elsewhere.
Script.name: Compress Delicious List

Script.description: On the Google Maps streetview, shows the panorama thumbnail (with a link to the larger one).
Script.name: Google Maps Streetview Thumbnail

Script.description: Searches multiple torrent sites for the movie, videogame, etc
Script.name: IMDB: Search Torrents

Script.description: Quick scroll to next/previous image on a page with f/r buttons
Script.name: Next Image/Previous Image

Script.description: Allows you to tweak personas. TODO: Allows you to load any image on the web as a Persona.
Script.name: Personas 3D Tweaker

Script.description: Stops Firefox from using up CPU unneccessarily, by removing plugins and disabling javascript timers on tabs which have been left idle. Useful if you have a slow PC, or you like to open 20 tabs and then do something else without closing them. Allows the user to restart the plugins when they return to the tab, but not the timers.
Script.name: Reclaim CPU

Script.description: Shows Delicious info for the target page in a tooltip when you hover over a link.
Script.name: Delicious Link Tooltop

Script.description: Quickly subscribe and unsubscribe del.icio.us tags
Script.name: delisub

Script.description: Sort all the links on the page by their title, URL or popularity.
Script.name: Delicious.com - Sort Visible Links

Script.description: Adds links to hide/show shared bookmarks in a user's page in delicious.com. This allows the user to see a list of their private bookmarks, a functionality that delicious.com does not provide yet.
Script.name: Delicious.com Private Bookmarks Only

Script.description: Adds some extra keystrokes to Firefox.
Script.name: More Keybinds

Script.description: Adds a "visited" colour to pouet.net, so you can see which pages you have already visited.
Script.name: Demo Seen

Script.description: Preview screenshots straight from the prods search by hovering over links.
Script.name: Pouet Plus

Script.description: Adds Clusty.com-like magnifiers on web and news search results to preview a link in a frame
Script.name: Google Link Preview

Script.description: Lets you install any bookmarklet as a user script.
Script.name: Bookmarklets to User Scripts

Script.description: Watch video on the web in a brand new way: You don't need a glint, the magic lantern is ignited!
Script.name: Linterna Mágica

Script.description: Check the use of new kind of cookies: sessionStorage, localStorage, globalStorage and databaseStorage.
Script.name: Storage Viewer

Script.description: Adds option to install script with an icon and/or updater. "So easy, a cavemonkey can do it"
Script.name: uso - installWith

Script.description: Quick view of the history of this tab. (Allows me to make a quick decision about whether to close it, or go back to an earlier page.)
Script.name: Tab History

Script.description: An open source layer above any website
Script.name: ShiftSpace

Script.description: Download Link + Quality Selector + Rollover Preview + Media Controller + Media Resizer + More...
Script.name: YouTube Enhancer

Script.description: Adds a few nifty Youtube enhancements
Script.name: funkwurm Youtube Nifties

Script.description: Intercepts console.log calls to display log messages in a div floating on the page. Tries to be a replacement for normal browser Error Consoles (which can be a little slow to open).
Script.name: FastJSLogger

Script.description: Default functions for GM_ API library for wider browser compatibility and execution of userscripts from bookmarklets.
Script.name: FallbackGMAPI

Script.description: Don't use Greasemonkey to load your userscripts, use this lighter interface instead! Also works as a bookmarklet.
Script.name: One Click Userscripts

Script.description: When you paste a URL to a friend, it is useful if it contains the title of the page. This script adds these missing titles for common websites using # part of URL. In other words, it turns non-semantic URLs into semantic URLs!
Script.name: URLs Need Titles

Script.description: query freebase in natural language by simply typing, from any website
Script.name: Freebase boyfriend

Script.description: Scrolls the page when you move the mouse up and down
Script.name: Auto Scroll Mouse

Script.description: Auto scroll page on Ctrl+Down. Escape to stop.
Script.name: Auto scroll keys

Script.description: Adds a TOC to a viewed HTML page
Script.name: TOCMonkey

Script.description: On pages which do not have a Table of Contents, but should do, create one!
Script.name: Table of Contents Everywhere

Script.description: View links inline (without leaving the current page) by clicking the preview buttons beside them.
Script.name: Inline Preview

Script.description: Hover on a link to get: thumbnails of the page's images.
Script.name: VisualLinks

Script.description: Allows you to add links to a playlist, then navigate through your playlist. Useful it you want to look at a set of pages without using multiple tabs.
Script.name: WebPage Playlist

Script.description: If a tab is unused for a long time, it switches to a light holding page until the tab is focused again. This helps the browser to recover memory, and can speed up the re-opening of large sessions.
Script.name: Hibernate Idle Tabs

Script.description: Enhancements for Facebook: bigger profile pictures and photos, easier viewing of albums, links to download videos, showing people's age and sign, google calendar integration, keyboard shortcuts & more. Compatible with new Facebook and fully customizable!
Script.name: FFixer

Script.description: Navigate sideways! When you click a link, related links on the current page are carried with you. They can be accessed from a pager on the target page, so you won't have to go back in your browser.
Script.name: Related Links Pager

Script.description: Makes images link directly to the original in Google Images search. The source website link is moved to the green URL below the image. Also gives the option to always use the basic (old) version of Google Images.
Script.name: Google Images direct links

Script.description: Looks for dates displayed on the current page and converts them to ages of the form "3 days 6 hours ago".
Script.name: Convert Dates to Ages

Script.description: Adds the likes/dislikes light-saber to YouTube thumbnails, so you can avoid watching crap videos. Activates when mouse passes over a thumbnail.
Script.name: YouTube Thumb Likes Dislikes

Script.description: Makes Youtube's "Watch" page (video page) better, by putting the video description to the right of the video, and a couple other things.
Script.name: Youtube - Better Watch Page

Script.description: Download videos from YouTube. Simple, lightweight and supports all formats, including WebM.
Script.name: YouTube Video Download

Script.description: Download YouTube videos with a single click of a button!
Script.name: YouTube + MP3 Downloader

Script.description: Add thumbnail previews to bookmarks on Delicious.com.
Script.name: Delicious.com Thumbs

Script.description: A script to add thumbnails previews to the links posted on del.icio.us
Script.name: snap.icio.us

Script.description: replace the screenshot of the prods on Pouet.net by the embedded YT capture if possible
Script.name: Pouet 'YT embed' | v0.01

Script.description: Add direct link to images and pages in google image search
Script.name: Google Images direct link

Script.description: When hovering a link, some browsers fail to present information about the link. This script displays the target href/URL in the bottom-left corner of the page, like Chrome and Firefox do.
Script.name: Show Link URL in Corner

Script.description: Miss being able to see the good old window.status? This userscript will pop up the status in the corner of the page.
Script.name: Bring Back The Status Bar

Script.description: Adds a sidebar with search results from Dictionary.com, Wikipedia, Flickr, and Youtube. Please report any bugs.
Script.name: Google Search Sidebar for FF3 - Wikipedia, Dictionary.com, Flickr, and Youtube Results FIX 2

Script.description: Provides a button to pupout the current YouTube video in a new window.
Script.name: YouTube Popout Button

Script.description: Adds a sidebar with search results from Dictionary.com, Wikipedia, Flickr, and Youtube. Please report any bugs.
Script.name: Google Search Sidebar for FF3 - Wikipedia, Dictionary.com, Flickr, and Youtube Results FIX 2

Script.description: Creates code to download web pages, images and other files using wget
Script.name: Download with Wget

Script.description: Based on the script "DDG++" by nabeschin. Fixed it to work with the new layout of DDG, added new style and search engines.
Script.name: DuckDuckGo Extended

Script.description: Filters out scam scripts at Userscripts.org.
Script.name: Userscripts.org Scam Filter
